ggvega 0.0.0.9002
  • Reference

Extract layers

Source: R/extract_layers.R
layer_spc.Rd

Extract necessary information from the ggplot layers object.

layer_spc(layer_plt, int_data, int_map)

Arguments

layer_plt

A list of layers from the ggplot object.
int_data

An intermediate-form for the data created by data_int().
int_map

An intermediate-form for the mapping created by mapping_spc().

Value

list of layers each with their layer components

Examples

library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(data = iris)
p <- p + geom_point(aes(x = Petal.Width, y = Petal.Length))
dat <-  data_int(p$data, p$layers)
maps <- mapping_spc(p$mapping)
layer_spc(p$layers, dat, maps)
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]]$data
#> [1] "data-00"
#> 
#> [[1]]$geom
#> [[1]]$geom$class
#> [1] "GeomPoint"
#> 
#> 
#> [[1]]$mapping
#> [[1]]$mapping$x
#> [[1]]$mapping$x$field
#> [1] "Petal.Width"
#> 
#> 
#> [[1]]$mapping$y
#> [[1]]$mapping$y$field
#> [1] "Petal.Length"
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> [[1]]$aes_params
#> NULL
#> 
#> [[1]]$stat
#> [[1]]$stat$class
#> [1] "StatIdentity"
#> 
#> 
#>
